Collect the GPS coordinates of the field (on the entry point)
input.hint: Make sure the accuracy is less than 10 meters

input.label: Name of the variety
input.hint: enter "na" if the farmer is unable to recall variety name

select1.label: Select the phenological stage of the crop

input.label: Diseases scoring A. Eye estimation (0-100%) of the crop ground cover in quadrat area B. Take NDVI reading at the centre of the quadrat before setting the quadrat. Take three (photographs) a. whole quadrat b. whole plant c. close snap of leaf / diseased area

select1.label: How many Quadrats are you using?

input.label: Visually estimate the crop ground cover (0 - 100%) in each 1 meter square quadrat
